column4: Hello.  I've got a hardy server install going, and want to add the gnome desktop.  Problem is, I don't have internet access.  Can I do this from cd?
I'm doing it for class.  sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop doesn't work.
We're networking a windows and linux server, and then a windows and linux client.
Whenever I try to run sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop it says it couldn't find the package.  I have the disk as my repository.
If I install from the desktop cd could I then add the server stuff from the server cd?
